alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dallas; Hickory; Laclede; Polk; St. Clair; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, southwest, and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Hickory. In southwest Missouri, Cedar, Dallas, Laclede, Polk, Webster and Wright. In west central Missouri, St. Clair. * WHEN...Until 345 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Osage Fork at Auburn Road, Lindley Creek at Mathis Road, Four Mile Creek at Highway P, Weaubleau Creek at Highway V and Weaubleau Creek at 350 Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lebanon, Bolivar, Buffalo, Hermitage, Humansville, Conway, Weaubleau and Urbana. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Dallas; Hickory; Laclede; Polk; St. Clair; Webster; Wright
